import{TRANSFER_ADD_REQUEST,TRANSFER_ADD_SUCCESS,TRANSFER_ADD_FAIL,USER_UPDATE_TRANSFER_FAIL,USER_UPDATE_TRANSFER_REQUEST,USER_UPDATE_TRANSFER_SUCCESS}from"../Constants/TransferConstants";export var transferReducer=function transferReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case TRANSFER_ADD_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case TRANSFER_ADD_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,transactions:action.payload};case TRANSFER_ADD_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};// UPDATE TRANSFER
export var userUpdateTransferReducer=function userUpdateTransferReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case USER_UPDATE_TRANSFER_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case USER_UPDATE_TRANSFER_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,success:true,userInfo:action.payload};case USER_UPDATE_TRANSFER_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
